marsbars

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • marsbars.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class combines all the controller/sensor panel GUIs and adds GUI elements for file control
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUI

        public GUI(EnvironmentView eGUI,
           TemperatureView tGUI,
           HumidityView hGUI,
           MoistureView mGUI)
        Controller which takes in all the GUI sub components. It sets up the display and dimensions of the Main GUI window. The File and Simulation control buttons are added to the GUI in this constructor.
        Parameters:
        eGUI - Object containing the JPanel of the Environment/External Effect Control Panel
        tGUI - Object containing the JPanel of the Temperature Control Panel
        hGUI - Object containing the JPanel of the Humidity Control Panel
        mGUI - Object containing the JPanel of the Soil Moisture Control Panel

    • Method Detail

      • updateButtonsWhenRunning

        public void updateButtonsWhenRunning()
        Disable the ability to load and save a simulation after it has been started by disabling the UI Buttons. After starting simulation you can only pause, resume, and close.

      • updateButtonsWhenPaused

        public void updateButtonsWhenPaused()
        Update the UI button functionality when simulation is paused. Change the start button to a resume button.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(java.lang.String currStatus)
        Let the user know that the simulation is being saved to file or whether they are in simulation playback mode.
        Parameters:
        currStatus - The message to display on the UI informing user of the simulation mode

      • loadMode

        public void loadMode()
        Disable the load button when save file is selected for simulation data save. The two actions cannot be allowed at the same time.

      • saveMode

        public void saveMode()
        Disable the save button when a simulation data file is loaded for playback. The two actions cannot be allowed at the same time.

      • addStartSimulationListener

        public void addStartSimulationListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener theListener)
        Listens to see if the user wants to start the simulation from the beginning
        Parameters:
        theListener - The object that is executes the changes are triggered.
